title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint.

g. The File Editors preference page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same.

Currently, fixes have been made for a, c, and f.

Need to release

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
SR:
MA (09/08/2001 12:04:06)

1. Go to the WorkbenchFile Editors preference page.

2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.

3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (no selection should be made) and press 'OK'.

Expected Result: The selected external editor should be added to the associated editors list.
